translations: v.将……对分；认为……是分开的（dichotomise 的过去式及过去分词，dichotomise 等于 dichotomize）

sentences.sentence: The primary outcome measure was the score on the modified Rankin scale (mRS) at 1 year dichotomised between favourable (0-4) and unfavourable (5 and death) outcome.
sentences.translation: 初步的测量指标是1年内的改良Rankin指数，分为有利（0-4）和不利（5和死亡）两部分。
